aircraft.value: Spectre Night - AC-3201-764 at Sector North Station

defect_observed.value: Radar display intermittent blanking. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 24/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 26/02/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 01/03/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 01/03/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 06/03/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Radar display intermittent blanking. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component.
Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
